commit.message:
slp-reduc-3.c: Make check dependent on vect_unpack.

2010-11-18  Steve Ellcey  <sje@cup.hp.com>

	* gcc.dg/vect/slp-reduc-3.c: Make check dependent on vect_unpack.
	* gcc.dg/vect/slp-reduc-6.c: Ditto, plus add alignment.

From-SVN: r166922
